ModMetaData.name: Organs Expanded by Kkokoros!
ModMetaData.author: Kkokoros
ModMetaData.description:
Just a simple mod that expands parts in pawns body
Adds body parts like: spleen, which increases immunity pancreas, which increases food intake gallbladder, which improves blood filtration and increases food intake
For better experience use with Prosthetics and Organs by Kkokoros!
